WorkItem.Description:
There's a problem in optimization here. I tried to make a setup for low level bosses (5-man level 87) and to my surprise it reforged some available items to have more hit. It was already overcapped and it reached more than 13% with them.
 
This does not happen on another file which does not have 'blue diamonds'. (it correctly drops hit to very low levels)
 
Here's the file that happens [attached]
 
 
It uses blue diamonds because it's supposed to be an unimportant spec for non raiding. It does not go away if 'Boss Handler' is ticked with boss there being lower than 88 and it does not fix either if the levels of single and multiple targets are set to 70.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Level of boss is ignored (or malfunctioning) in optimization , at least when 'blue diamonds' are used.

Comments.Message: Can you be more specific which items you think were reforged wrong? When I optimize this character none of the green diamond items has a reforge to hit.
I'm so sorry. Please close the report. The ones with hit were blue diamond items. Forgive my ignorance of that and wasting your time.
